AdalMedicineAdvantages.title: Advantages of treatment with Adal Medicine
items: A clear roadmap without extra stress. We plan the entire process in advance: documents, timelines, coordination, and logistics are combined into a simple system with no fuss or surprises.
Support during anxiety and uncertainty. We stay by your side at every step: calmly explain what comes next, how to prepare, and what matters most — exactly what patients often lack.
A conscious choice of clinics and specialists. We rely on proven experience, not random recommendations: we work only with doctors and clinics verified through practice and patient outcomes.
Transparent pricing and a clear process. No “we’ll уточним later,” no unexpected extra fees or hidden clauses — all costs and steps are discussed in advance, before the trip.

Deep knowledge of Turkey’s healthcare system. We know how it works in real life: where to go for a specific diagnosis, how hospitalization is arranged, what documents are needed, and what to watch for — saving time, money, and nerves.

WhenTreatmentAbroadRecommended.title: When is treatment abroad recommended?
items: If there are doubts about the diagnosis — you need a second independent opinion and accurate diagnostics.
If an urgent surgery is needed and waiting lists in your country stretch for weeks or months.
If a comprehensive approach is required: diagnostics, a medical board, and an action plan within a short timeframe.
If high-tech procedures are needed (catheter-based interventions, robotic methods, hybrid procedures).
If you want a more detailed, extended opinion on the diagnosis or the treatment plan.
